Russia says it will have no trouble skirting latest EU sanctionsRussia said on Tuesday it would have no difficulty skirting the latest package of EU economic sanctions, which notably target its diamond exports. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 14:09:05 GMT SYST4E3SYBKYVNHM4DS27REJCQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-it-will-have-no-trouble-skirting-latest-eu-sanctions-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Swedish court upholds life sentence in Iran executions caseA Swedish appeals court on Tuesday upheld a guilty verdict and life sentence given to a former Iranian official convicted last year for his part in a mass execution of political prisoners in Iran in 1988. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 13:12:10 GMT 3OFKHDDKYBJW3JAETOSJ5I5XVQ https://www.reuters.com/world/swedish-court-upholds-guilty-verdict-iran-executions-case-2023-12-19/Reuters世界
Russian former soldier wants to testify to ICC over war crimes witnessedA former Russian soldier has sought asylum in the Netherlands and wants to testify at the International Criminal Court about war crimes by Russia that he witnessed while fighting in Ukraine, a Dutch legal source told Reuters on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 13:07:47 GMT HWR4VMNEDRL7JD6CDSRSNHNFEQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-former-soldier-wants-testify-icc-over-war-crimes-witnessed-2023-12-19/Stephanie Van Den Berg世界欧洲
Hungary ready to lift objection to Bulgaria's Schengen entryHungary will lift its objection to Bulgaria joining Europe's passport-free Schengen zone after the Bulgarian parliament formally confirms its scrapping of an extra tax on Russian gas shipments, Foreign Minister Peter Szijjarto said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 13:03:41 GMT 3DZM444PYNNGXD7CVEBPQZJ7MM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungary-ready-lift-objection-bulgarias-shengen-entry-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Steady hearts, steady hands as Vatican experts restore masterpiecesWhenever Alessandra Zarelli, a restorer at the Vatican Museums, works on a masterpiece by an artist such as Michelangelo, she steadies her heart so her mind can concentrate on the task at hand. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 12:48:00 GMT 5U2Z3Q7VBNML3DMD2COLKMMUYA https://www.reuters.com/lifestyle/steady-hearts-steady-hands-vatican-experts-restore-masterpieces-2023-12-19/Philip Pullella生活方式
Italian navy to send frigate to boost Red Sea securityThe Italian navy will "in the coming hours" send one of its frigates to help protect the Red Sea shipping route against attacks by Yemen's Houthi militants, Italy's defence ministry said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 12:45:19 GMT ASESFS6E4ZPCVPCLVNMXTAJYF4 https://www.reuters.com/world/italian-navy-send-frigate-boost-red-sea-security-2023-12-19/Angelo Amante, Alvise Armellini世界
Putin says Russia is ready to talk on UkrainePresident Vladimir Putin said on Tuesday that Russia would be prepared to talk to Ukraine, the United States and Europe about the future of Ukraine if they wanted to, but that Moscow would defend its national interests. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 12:32:38 GMT ZQCYU5EUFBMFXDXYRR7ZF6JQIM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/putin-says-Russia-is-ready-talk-ukraine-2023-12-19/Guy Faulconbridge世界欧洲
Brazil's first lady to sue Musk's X over hacked accountBrazilian first lady Rosangela 'Janja' Lula da Silva said on Tuesday she will sue Elon Musk-owned social media platform X, formerly known as Twitter, after having her account hacked last week. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 12:08:43 GMT NKMK3OUKMRPJRJQGYTWPRBFBJI https://www.reuters.com/technology/cybersecurity/brazil-first-lady-sue-musks-x-over-hacked-account-2023-12-19/Reuters技术网络安全
Turkey's Erdogan says EU will 'stall' Ukraine, Moldova accessionTurkish President Tayyip Erdogan was on Tuesday cited as saying the European Union would stall Ukraine and Moldova's accession to the EU, adding that Ankara had long earned the right to join the bloc but was being kept waiting for political reasons. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 12:07:37 GMT MMYZFJCPQJN7TORINNXX4RS2LQ https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/turkeys-erdogan-says-eu-will-stall-ukraine-moldova-accession-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
UK warns of deteriorating security in Red Sea, Royal Navy ship joins taskforceBritain warned that the security situation in the Red Sea was deteriorating and ballistic missile and drone attacks were an increased threat, as it agreed for a Royal Navy Destroyer to join a U.S.-led operation to safeguard commerce in the region. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 12:00:37 GMT QN43SUZWNBLLPK6S3WJ3LKT7AI https://www.reuters.com/world/uk-warns-deteriorating-security-red-sea-royal-navy-ship-joins-taskforce-2023-12-19/Sarah Young世界
Julian Assange's 'final' appeal against U.S. extradition to be held in FebruaryWikiLeaks' founder Julian Assange's possible final legal challenge to stop his extradition from Britain to the United States where he is wanted on criminal charges will be held at London's High Court in February, his supporters said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 11:57:14 GMT WEDP5MVW6ZLZ5K7K3TY5GAEFIQ https://www.reuters.com/world/julian-assanges-final-appeal-against-us-extradition-be-held-february-2023-12-19/Reuters世界
